page.title: 04OXFORD UNITED 1
page.content: Oxford United won the Second Division of the Canon League in the l984/l985 season, and will start its career in the First Division in l985/l986 for the first time ever. l68 local people were asked about their attitudes to the club. ll5 were male and 53 female. 26% were under l5, 23% aged l6-20, 20% aged 2l-30, l7% aged 3l-50 and l4% aged over 50. 93% were pleased that Oxford United had reached the First Division, although only 67% claimed to support the club. Of the supporters, 83% said that they often watched home matches. 87% of male supporters regularly went to the Manor (Oxford United's ground) and 70% of female supporters. Two out of three people interviewed aged under-l5 or over-50 often went to home matches; only half people aged l6 to 50 did so. Local people had high
